Name.Description: The name of the Amazon Kinesis stream. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation                                 generates a unique physical                                  ID and uses that ID for the stream name. For more information, see                                  Name Type.ImportantIf you specify a name, you cannot perform updates that require replacement of this                                    resource.                                    You can perform updates that require no or some interruption. If you must replace                                    the resource, specify a new name.

ShardCount.Description: The number of shards that the stream uses. For greater provisioned throughput,                                 increase the number of shards.

Tags.Description: An arbitrary set of tags (keyâ€“value pairs) to associate with the Amazon Kinesis                                 stream. For information about constraints for this property, see Tag Restrictions in the                                 Amazon Kinesis Developer Guide.

Key.Description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters                                 in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits,                                 whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.Description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters                                 in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits,                                 whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
